21st Century Programs - After School and Fridays

span.br:

p.span:
1. Average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2020 (budget year): $44,336
(Average with 301 Classroom Site Funds and Performance Pay: $50,5086)
2. Average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2018 (prior year): $41,190
3. Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year: $3,146

Comments on average salary calculation (Optional): Calculation does not include 301 pay ($3000 per year
from Classroom Site Funds) or 301 performance pay (possible $3250 per year for meeting all
requirements). It also does not include extra duty stipends.
5. Average salary of all teachers employed in FY 2018: $37,363
6. Total percentage increase in average teacher salary since FY 2018: 19%
Classified employees received an average $1 raise from the prior year.
